metadata.title: Analyst warns Bitcoin could drop to $10K, as price crashes to $86K
metadata.description: Bitcoin extended its November slump on Nov. 20, briefly dipping below $88,000. According to CoinGecko data, Bitcoin traded around $87,319 intraday, down about 4% over the past 24 hours and nearly 13% on the week, after falling from highs above $103,000 just days ago. 'Big Short’ Michael Burry ...
